display_long_description:
# EnonoGolf Personal
**The Ultimate Home Golf Experience**

Transform your space into a professional golf environment. **EnonoGolfPersonal** combines authentic course simulation, advanced swing analysis, and engaging mini-games to help you master your game.

---

## ⛳ EnonoGolf Round
Experience the thrill of the fairway from anywhere.

**Real Course Reproduction**

All included courses are scanned reproductions of real-world golf courses. Experience the authentic terrain and strategy of actual locations.

---

## 🏌️‍♂️ Driving Range
Train like a pro with high-tech analysis tools.

**Swing Analysis**

Evaluate your form based on ball trajectory. You can switch views to check your swing from the **Side** or **Top** angles for a complete mechanical breakdown.

---

**Smart Replay & Comparison**

Review your past swings instantly. Use the comparison function to view your replays side-by-side with built-in **professional player data** to identify areas for improvement.

---

**Volumetric Pro Playback**

Experience the next generation of training. Utilizing **volumetric video captured in a dedicated studio**, you can project a professional’s 3D swing into your space. Compare and sync your form with a pro's like never before.

---

## 🎮 Mini-Games
Sharpen your skills with fun, arcade-style challenges:

**🎈 Balloon**
Test your accuracy by popping targets.

---

**🏢 Building**
A unique target challenge amidst city structures.

---

**💥 Driving Contest**
Unleash your power for the longest drive.

---

**⛳ Nearest-to-the-Pin**
Master your approach shots.
[media]
